Color: Gold

Shape: Rectangular
Thickness: 135 GSM
Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
1 pc, Seamless Design
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Crinkle Taffeta Tablecloth

Our crinkle taffeta tablecloths have an undeniable and unsurpassed charm that makes simple items look highly fashionable and modish.  Spread it atop your dreary tables or plain, lackluster table covers to achieve the excellence of class and vibrancy. The lovely crinkles accented all over the surface coupled with the impeccable metallic glint of lustrous taffeta will impart an imperial sublimity to your banquet or wedding tables.

Premium Quality

Let this exquisite tablecloth enchant the entire ambiance of your special event with its seamless luster and upscale look. Combining the glistening luster of premium quality taffeta with the classy appeal of crinkle design, we present these elegant tablecloths to augment the beauty of your tables.

     

Perfect for Theme Events

Create a perfect harmony of elegance and style by complementing these tablecloths with matching taffeta chair covers, table runners, table skirts, chair skirts, chair caps and sashes. 

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Hand wash, Hang dry only.
  • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Let your creativity run wild, light a standard taper or pillar candle to exude soft romantic glow, or get ingenious by filling fairy lights, flower petals, rose or hydrangea heads, or any other whimsical accent in these multi-purpose holder stands.

Splayed metal base give firm support to your candle and floral decorations, while ornate metal top simply add a seamless regal charm to your tabletops!

entry.title: 85" x 85" Champagne Pintuck Square Overlay
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2220
Type: Overlays
Price: 9.88 - 225.28 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Overlay
Material: Taffeta Pintuck
Color: Champagne

Each Square Measures: 3" x 3"
Edges: Serged
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use a dryer.
Perfect to be used on top of our tablecloths as accents.
Can be used for weddings, banquets, or any type of celebration.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Pintuck is actually a fold of fabric that is stitched intricately to hold it in a place, very much like a pleat. These lovely pleats impart a decorative effect to the fabric by fashioning a visual line at a chosen point. They effortlessly bridge vintage and contemporary styles to create a majestic new classic look. If you do not want your celebration to blend in with other weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries, try our premium quality pintuck overlays that contain everything you need to lend your event the look and aura that it deserves. Celebrate your special day with our splendid square pintuck style table cloths spread elegantly atop your plain and ordinary table covers. Be the show stopper by designing some awesome bows and other accents with pintuck patterns and style. Create an inviting ambiance for your guests by throwing a pintuck theme ambiance containing squared pattern napkins, sashes, runners, and linens.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 85" x 85" Square
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Material: Taffeta Pintuck. Edges are Serged.
  • Each square measures : 3"x3".
  • Perfect to be used on top of our tablecloths as accents.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: 2 Pack | 31" Metallic Champagne Artificial Palm Leaf Display Filler Floral Decoration
entry.summary:

Qty: 2 Bushes / Order

Overall Width: 8"

Fronds Count: 36 Fronds / Bush

Fronds are spray painted with metallic paint.
Great for indoor use. Dry dust for easy care and cleaning.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Bursting with sparkle and style, these glamorous floral picks are made to WOW the beholders! Their charismatic combination of nature and craft inspiration makes them an ethereal addition to your tabletops, centerpieces, Christmas tree decorations, and floral arrangements. Enriching your surrounding with surreal shimmer and providing your décor with a touch of glittery elegance, our metallic tone frond picks are great to use in weddings, parties, holiday functions, and home accenting. From your coffee table to your mantle, place these anywhere in your home for exuding monochromatic beauty. Perfect to use on their own, these stems create a whimsical look when combined with other picks, arrangements, floral stems, and bouquets. Bend the wiry branches to create that stunner look! Bring a bit of fancy and pizazz by placing these in our tall vases or let them lie flat oozing mystic beauty to your tables, cabinets, shelves, and aisle. Available in a range of classy shades, get the one that matches your theme to add that perfect finishing touch to your decorative flower arrangement, swag or welcoming wreath.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Soft Plastic
  • Qty: 2 Bushes / Order
  • Overall Height: 31" 
  • Overall Width: 8"
  • Stem Height: 18" 
  • Stem Color: Brown
  • Bendable Wire Stem: Yes
  • Fronds Count: 36 Fronds / Bush
  • Frond (leaves) Height: 14" 
  • Individual Frond size: 2.5" smallest | 5.5" largest
  • Frond Thickness: Less than 1/2"
  • No bendable wire inside the Fronds.
  • Fronds are flexible but not sturdy enough to stay bent.
  • Fronds are spray painted with metallic paint.
  • Great for indoor use. Dry dust for easy care and cleaning.
